```{r, echo=F, message=F, include=F}
devtools::load_all(".")
source('./man/code/plot.R')
source('./man/code/utils.R')
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  fig.path = "../figures/conjugates-"
)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(dev = 'svg')
p = RATIONAL_FRACTION_PRECISION
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
period = 3
t=seq(0,2*pi*period,0.01)
y_sin=sin(t)
plot(t,y_sin,type="l")
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
y_cos=cos(t)
plot(t,y_cos,type="l")
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
plot(y_sin,y_cos,type="l",asp=1)
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
z=exp(1) ^ (sqrt(-1+0i)*t)
plot(t,Re(z),type="l")
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
plot(t,Im(z),type="l")
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
plot(z,type="l",asp=1)
```
